name: YBit
description:
You will be playing as a small hero made of information, trying to escape from a program that has crashed. Avoiding errors, not falling down and getting to the exits will be your mission.How to Play
Just move around with the arrows and press space to talk.In Development
This game is still being developed and it is currently being made only by me. The plan is to invest most (if not all) of the earnings in the game until it is finished.

If you buy the game, please take into account the following things:
  • I am extremely grateful for your support!
  • The game will be updated as frequently as possible.
  • The game isn't finished yet.
  • You will be getting the game cheaper than when it gets officially released.
